Name: Sort the Cube
About the game: Sort the Cube is a minimalistic puzzle game in which you have to arrange all the sides of a cube in the proper order by sliding around the little pieces that make up the cube into the blank spot. The game features: Several cube sizes A couple of images Selectable shuffling So prepare yourself and start putting those little cubes into their places. And donâ€™t forget that the cube has six sides.
